website_summaries.verdict: About twice the size and burn time as other luxury candles, but comes at approximately half the price. It's also cute.
pros: Not only do you get a nice-looking jar and up to 130 hr
of burn time from the soy-based wax, but youalso get a well-balanced scent that isn't overpowering for a mid-range price
cons: Owners report that it's smoky when burning and produces soot
Keeping the wick trimmed helps minimize this problem

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a NOT THE REAL DEAL. I had this gifted to me as a bridal shower gift. My friend who got it for me had got it from a cute little boutique. When I had used up all of my candle and wanted another but didn’t wan to make the drive I found myself looking on amazon for the candle. I “found it” kinda... not really. It LOOKS like the original candle but the smell is HORRIBLE. It doesn’t even smell similar to the real deal. Completely crap. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Maquel Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: I gave this a 2 because I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 2 because I love the smell, but this candle caused extreme soot and a cloud of smoke in my living toom. I left it burning all night and woke up blowing black soot out of my nose. There was also soot all over the room it was burning in - on the lamp shades, plants, pictures on the wall and on the kitchen counters. The cloud of smoke and black soot in my nose was quite alarming as I have never experienced this with any other candle. The white ceiling above the candle also had a light smoke stain.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very Smoky Candle
customer_reviews.text: This candle has the most wonderful fragrance But! This candle will turn everything black around it, I did what the instructions said, before lighting I cut down the wicks 1/4 “and only lit one side because I was trying to figure out why it was doing that but it makes me sad because I bought 4 that day and they aren’t cheap so I had to keep watching and wiping things down
customer_reviews.author: sharon pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, burns fast, black smoke
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the smell of their products and have purchased many . My complaint is the amount of black smoke that is produced from the candles. You cannot smell the Blacksmoke but I don’t think It should put off so much. Took pictures of the candles so that you could see the black smoke that comes off the candle. The Blacksmoke can be seen from the flame as well but obviously not in the photo. it also burns quickly. On a positive, the fragrance is very pleasant and can be smelt throughout the room.
customer_reviews.author: Sheneeses_Pieces

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Really love the smell and if you keep the wicks trimmed and don't burn it down until it starts getting black on the sides of the glass it won't explode.
customer_reviews.author: kita

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be...😔
customer_reviews.text: In the early 2000's I purchased these candles at a home boutique store near Covington Georgia and I fell in love with them, my favorite scents are Diva, High Maintenance, Paris and Pristine. They lasted for years and I used them all the time and burned them for hours on end. I was disappointed with this one because it bearly lasted a month and the wicks were gone, I don't know if they have changed the formula or if it was just old but something has changed. I'm not sure if I will purchase again. I'm very sad because I really love the scents.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It burns really dirty and I think that the candle I received is ...
customer_reviews.text: This candle produces a lot of soot. It burns really dirty and I think that the candle I received is very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever, can smell when not lit.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I read it’s a fake, but it’s not. Smells amazing, & fills the house. You do need to trim wick every burn, and that’ll keep the soot away. I’ve had one of these candles for over two years, burning on very rare occasions because I didn’t wanna waste it. Then I found them in here, I’ll be burning from now on, as my main candle. I want to try other scents but I know I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Exploding candle!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought about 4 of these candles, and absolutely love the smell!! However, I was just burning this 22oz candle when it completely exploded. Glass shattered everywhere within a 5 foot radius. Fire from the wick was still burning after the candle exploded, causing us to immediately put out the fire with a towel and also causing a large burn in our side table. This is extremely dangerous for anyone who would have been close to the candle when it exploded. I'm thoroughly disappointed. The candle had little wax left to burn but still, a product should never be this dangerous for consumers...
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found the 2 pack set. I have this exact candle for myself and love the scent, it is so strong it makes my whole kitchen and living room smell good when lit and the candle lasts for a long time because of the size. It is fragrant without being too much like flowers or perfume but also not a crisp and clean smell either. Gave each candle to friends for Christmas gift and they loved it. Perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Candles!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tyler candles so I was thrilled when I saw them cheaper on Amazon. The smell on this candle isn’t sweet, a little more earthy and masculine, but lovely. It was packaged well and no damage upon arrival. It’s also an authentic Tyler Candle. The brand has updated their iconic packaging and the lid is decorated differently which is notated on their website and social media.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love the DIVA scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent...DIVA! One of my FAVORITES! This large candle last a long time, the scent travels throughout your entire house. I've tried other scents from Tyler Co BUT Diva tops them all.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle!
customer_reviews.text: Love the candle! Received quickly and packaged nicely. I love the detergent and the candle is awesome to burn to boost the scent between laundry days.
customer_reviews.author: SuddsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter-in-laws favorite scent. Glad they’ve a candle. We both use the laundry detergent for sweaters and tops. Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: VM - Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy and scent
customer_reviews.text: I love Tyler Candles and Diva is my signature scent. It is long lasting and I love most of their scents. Yes, they are a little more costly than some candles but the scent last a long time. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Genia Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Shattered!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these candles! But it was shipped in just a box with zero protection and arrived absolutely shattered. Amazon handled my refund beautifully as it was not available for an exchange. So to sum it up, awesome smelling candle, horrible packaging!
customer_reviews.author: GeauxLSU

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I hate that I love this candle so much. A-it’s not cheap B-I’m not sure what I’m breathing in. But dang does it make my house smell amazing. I always use it for parties before people come and they always ask me what I use.
customer_reviews.author: WENDI COHEN

customer_reviews.title: Best candle fragant
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several different fragrant of the Taler candles; they smell so good. The smell is not chemical like, does not make me sneeze or give me a headache like these cheap candles. It is pricy, but if it is for special occasions, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: VD Studio

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough Tyler Candle Co. !!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the Tyler Candle Co. products. My favorite scent is DIVA. I have several different sizes of this candle. They also make GREAT gifts. I am over-the-moon excited and thrilled with these candles. Their scents powerfully fill a room, even a small house depending on the size, without being overkill. Every single person I gift a Tyler Candle Co. candle to absolutely RAVES about it. Get as many as you can!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sander

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This item smelled so good! But, when I opened the box, the entire jar was cracked in a million little pieces. Completely devastated- and obviously unusable. The packaging was a thing layer of plastic wrap. It should have been much better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and really decided to make the splurge bc I’ve heard such great things. I anticipated it all week long. So excited and it arrived broken. Hoping I can return the broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like detergent or flowers. Smells clean and fresh and STRONG. Very picky about smells, this passes the test.
customer_reviews.text: Strong, scents large area. Very sensitive nose, hate cheap smelling candles. For reference, my fav scents are; Votivo Red Currant, Nest Bamboo, Yankee Sage and Citrus & Archipelago Havana. This one is perfect for my bedroom, smells clean, fresh and not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Autonomy

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! Tyler candles are just really nice candles Diva smells so nice! My husbands not a big "scent" persone but he does like this candle it smells like a beautiful perfume throughout my entire house! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Diva candle lesser quality
customer_reviews.text: II have purchased DIVA scent candles for the past year and unfortunately this purchase did not have the intense scent as the others purchased. I can only assess that it was an older and not as fragrant with time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette K.

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I buy this candle about 1-2 times a year. It has a strong fragrance and smells lovely. I don’t burn it for hours and hours, because the scent it so strong. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: 1-800-buyaf**kinchicken

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You have to be right by it, to smell it. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: fake diva candles here BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: these have to be fake no smell . don"t buy ....
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These candles smell great and fill your home with the lovely fragrance. They also last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Your house will smell so good you'll just never want to leave, but when you walk  back in your door you'll get it again!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best smelling candle ever - DIVA is the scent I just can't get enough of. And the laundry detergent.....oh my gosh, now my clothes smell so good -I just can't get enough of it. I have hand lotion and dryer sachets in the same DIVA scent as well. You will be hooked!
customer_reviews.author: jane black

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle! I will be repurchasing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this candle! The scent is long lasting! I receive lots of compliments on the clean smell. Excellent Value
customer_reviews.author: cresie wilson

customer_reviews.title: Strong incredible scented candle!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite candle. This smell is incredible. The fragrance is strong... better than all other candles I have tried. If you burn it for four hours the first time you light it, it will burn evenly and completely to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Neidra B.

customer_reviews.title: Stop buying cheap scented candles. Go with Tyler!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this scent is my favorite of all Tyler's candles. Tyler candles burn evenly and have super strong scent. Don't keep buying cheaper scented candles . . . You know you've been wasting your money antway, right? This candle burns over 80 hours . . . But please, for safety's sake, burn it where it's away from curtains, where you can see it to remind yourself to blow it out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna W

customer_reviews.title: Candle Exploded!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This candle exploded and shot glass everywhere, and damaged the table it was sitting on. Extremely dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Jdh2018

customer_reviews.title: I love these candles
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles! I love this scent! I feel like you can’t go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Price to high
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle small so beautiful price yo high
customer_reviews.author: Letitia  Smith Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best smelling candle
customer_reviews.text: I have heard such great things about the Tyler Candle Company and their scents but I when I finally received it, the scent wasn’t anything special. I was going to gift it away but ultimately returned it because there are better quality candles out there.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C

customer_reviews.title: Best candle scent ever created
customer_reviews.text: This candle has the BEST smell of any candle, ever. Burns a long time, the entire house smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something that caught the essence of the detergent, so we went for the candle. It didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Travis S.

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Diva candle. It smells great & lasts a good while. All my guests always compliment the smell.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I’ll order it again.
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent I love it. You can smell it through out the house. Great price.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the candles arrived broken. The packaging was fine but definitely not enough padding for glass.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY J.

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite is High Maintenance but Diva is almost as good! Great candle.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Hottinger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! Doesn't last as long as some of my other candles, but you can smell it as soon as you light it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: This scent is amazing! It smells light yes like you’ve walked into a fancy boutique. Do yourself a favor and buy one! It’s heavenly! I wish there were more products in this scent!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Makes the house smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These candles really do smell divine- the big size is a better value by far. Even my husband likes this fragrance.

customer_reviews.title: Diva for life!
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling candle. You can smell it throughout the home with 1 candle!
customer_reviews.author: K Fish

customer_reviews.title: I love this candle
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. I could burn it all day long. Smell is great. The wicks are a little to long. I have to trim them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Neater

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles and especially this scent. However, the glass was shattered when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Tyler Diva Candles
customer_reviews.text: Hi my name is Melanie I really love my Tyler diva candles thank you so much! My home smells so good I get so many compliments about how good it makes my home smells. If you haven’t purchase the diva candle yet please do so. Thanks Melanie
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Miles

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS FRAGRANCE LONG LASTING CANDLE
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous and long lasting candle. I reorder this candle because of the wonderful scent and the long lasting burn time. I highly recommend for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Smell is amazing. Just wish it lasted longer! (The candle not the scent!)
customer_reviews.author: SuzyDW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scent
customer_reviews.text: Amoung my favorites of the Tyler candle scents. Long lasting . I use a 3” candle warmer that I leave on all the time .

customer_reviews.title: Best smell EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAVORITE candle!!! It smells soooo good! People.are always commenting on the smell!!! Diva is AMAZING!!!! High maintenance is a super close second!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love..Love..Love Diva
customer_reviews.text: There is something about this scent that I love! I have had a hard time finding them in stores around here so Amazon was perfect. The company is very customer service oriented, also. The scent lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and long lasting. I can even put this in my half bath with the lid off and it smells great, not lit.
customer_reviews.author: samdeedee2

customer_reviews.title: The best candle ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling candles. They make your entire house smell just like Diva scent. Worth the money! Every friend is getting one for there birthday!!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not smell like the laundry detergent, it's a bit to strong.

customer_reviews.title: Needed to be packaged  better
customer_reviews.text: The candles were exactly what I wanted. o ordered 3 and they were individually bubble wrapped in one box. The only problem was one was completely shattered inside the it's own bubble wrap. They're pretty heavy , so I'm sure the persons during transit weren't very gentle with them
customer_reviews.author: lorena counterman

customer_reviews.title: This smells beyond amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product. I met a man in Texas recently while I was traveling and asked him what detergent he used because it smelled so good and he told me about this product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: S Holly

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as detergent. Smell dies not last as long

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This candle smells wonderful! Don’t need to keep it lit for long, so I’m sure it will last a very long time....thank you for the on-time delivery as well!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Day

customer_reviews.title: Richly scented, quality candles.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is gorgeous, the scents are thick and heavily perfumed. High quality all around. I've been buying from Tyler Candle Company since 2007 and will continue. The Diva scent is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rohloff

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CANDLE & get the laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Better than most candles because A. It smells amazing and B. The smell is very strong so we only burn one wick at a time which basically increases the life of your candle. The laundry detergent is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I will order again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these in boutiques and decided to try amazon with hesitation but I’m glad I did!! They are the same ;)) and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Stephaine

customer_reviews.title: This was my favorite candle but apparently when it gets low it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite candle but apparently when it gets low it doesn't just burn out like every other candle in the world. It had flames and smoke that my husband doused with water and forbid me to buy again (yikes) ...not sure what that was about?
customer_reviews.author: Mel Issa

customer_reviews.title: Great strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent and it’s one of the few candles with a scent that actually fills a large room.

customer_reviews.title: The smell is on another level!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best candle I have ever burned! Hands down! Didn’t last me very long bc I used it everyday after buying it! Re ordered another and wishing it would hurry up and arrive! The smell is like no other!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Best Candles Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Tyler candles will make your ENTIRE home smell AMAZING. Worth every single penny. Try the laundry detergent as well. Their products are expensive but they are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best candles
customer_reviews.text: Tyler candles out last most candles in burn time but it takes one candle to make any entire house smell so beautiful!!!! I have gifted these candles and their laundry detergent to so many friends

customer_reviews.title: Just like the detergent!

customer_reviews.text: I love the detergent and dryer sachets but this is my first time to order the candle and I am not disappointed. I prefer the Diva and will order it again.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good/hard returns
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling candles ever. One of mine was shattered and I’ve tried returning it for several days with zero response from amazon or seller. Sucks to have a $20 candle we can’t burn.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Speth

customer_reviews.title: Scent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this candle every morning during my time with the Lord. Bible reading praying etc. It has a calming affect. Can't talk about longevity yet. I probably will order again. Nice.

customer_reviews.title: Scent wasn’t very strong when burning
